 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָחִיר‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==nostril== (apparently from above √, and not connected with Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stab*** camel in wind-pipe, etc., Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְחַר‎</span> ***kill by stabbing***, in nose or throat, compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָחַר‎</span> ***perforate, kill by stabbing***, so that <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָחִיר‎</span> would = ***perforation***, and **<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נחר‎</span> ***snort*** would be denominative); — only dual sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנְּחִירָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵצֵא עָשָׁן‎</span> [[Job.41.12|Job 41:12]] (of crocodile). **
